nodes.text: S-1D5 was a protocol droid in the service of the Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, it was stationed in Coronet Spaceport in the Incorporation Islands region of the planet Corellia, distributing starship upgrades.
S-1D5 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Starship Upgrades vendor for Imperial players on Corellia.
